markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nightmare Vapor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=125)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 553 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Purportedly sourced from any number of outlandish locales, nightmare vapor is most often created by boiling the sweat collected from humanoids caught in the throes of terrible nightmares.

**Saving Throw** DC 36 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 round; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) (1 round); **Stage 2** confused and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 3** confused, flat-footed, and [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Nightmare Vapor
